article: Three kids to go until my turn to . At the front of the line, a girl in a pink swim suit is _ and climbs onto the diving board. Will she change her _ , like I did last week, I wonder? Encouraged by the teacher, the Pink Girl _ . Only two kids to go. I feel very _ . I tell myself _ my brain _ . You will be the _ one who can't go on the diving board. As I am thinking, another girl dives into the _ . Then it's my little brother Travis' turn. I _ my eyes, and then open them just in time to see him jump off the _ . He comes out of the water and smiles. I can't help _ , too. Nothing scares that kid. Then I realize it's my _ . I climb onto the diving board. _ are diving at the other end of the pool. Everywhere, everyone is _ . Except me. "What are you waiting for ?" asks the kid after my turn. I step forward. Then I _ Travis standing by the pool. "You can do it!" he shouts. That's what I've _ told him when he was _ to tie his shoes or write his name. I take a deep breath and step out into nothing. My body _ , and then I feel the water. I swim in the water for a while before I pull myself to the _ , where my face finds the sun. I DID IT!
